title: Unconventional
description: Happily ever after - what a joke! I tried that once and ended up divorced. Now, I only want one thing from men. Charlie Nelson is good at giving me that one thing. Really, really good.So good, in fact, I discovered a new side of myself. I never knew I liked  to watch until I saw his talented hands touching someone else. I never knew I liked to be watched until I felt his searing gaze on me.Maybe happily ever after isnâ€™t always a white picket fence, wedding bells, and 2.5 kids. Maybe it's something a bit more...unconventional.*Warning: this book contains dirty talk and threesomes. Intended for readers over 18 years of age.
author: Isabel Love
